post:
GreenValueHost is a proud, tall standing company founded on three core principals: Performance, Dependability, and Affordability. Since our launch in October 2012, our company strives to achieve what seems to be the impossible. We continuously strive to ascend to the top of the industry, providing hosting services at a level of quality and customer service that no other company can claim. Our company is made up of a unique team of individuals, well-determined and actively involved in the web hosting industy with years of experience and a passion for this industry. GreenValueHost is unlike any other hosting company out there. Host with us today; we'll welcome you to our family and you'll experience a difference - The GVH Difference.


GreenValueHost is proud to announce that for a limited time only, we are releasing a **$5/mo special VPS hosting deal exclusively for LowEndTalk members!** No coupon code necessary, all you need to do is go to the link, checkout, and have your on demand VPS activated instantly after payment!

**What's included?**
OpenVZ Virtualization
RAID-Protected Disk Space
Unmetered Premium Bandwidth
SolusVM VPS Management Panel
45 Day Money Back Guarantee
Instant Activation
Location: Buffalo, New York in the ColoCrossing Datacenter

**The Offer**
100GB Disk Space
Unmetered Bandwidth, 100mbps port
1024MB Guaranteed RAM
1536MB Burstable RAM
1 IPv4 Address
Unmanaged/Self Managed
Price: $5/month, every month!
**Order Link**: https://secure.greenvaluehost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=71


Have any questions? Please feel free to contact us!
https://secure.greenvaluehost.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3
